column4: does anyone know which messenger services ie aim, msn jabber, are actually supported in the voice and video chat in empathy on 10.10???
i've tried msn and it works fine
even though I mostly use skype for both
well i try to keep in touch with my old squad in afghan so i need something
voice and video chat we used to use yahoo but since i no longer have windows i cant do voice and vid with yahoo anymore
if you need msn there's also aMSN but based on your needs Skype might be the best option for you
i didn't get the first one and skype is free as long as both users have an account
oh sorry that was for someone else lol
n0alias yea join the marines if anything
